title: Tailwind CSS Basics
description: Learn how to use Tailwind CSS utility classes to quickly style your HTML elements

lessons.title: Text and Font Weight
lessons.description: Tailwind provides utility classes to style text appearance, like size and weight.
lessons.task: Make the heading bold and the paragraph text gray using Tailwind classes.

lessons.title: Background Colors
lessons.description: Use Tailwind background utility classes like bg-red-400 to style element backgrounds.
lessons.task: Apply a red background to the alert box and make the text white.
lessons.previewBaseCSS: body { font-family: system-ui, sans-serif; padding: 1.25rem; } .alert { padding: 1rem; border-radius: 0.5rem; }

validations.message: Use 'bg-red-400' to set the background color

lessons.title: Spacing with Margin and Padding
lessons.description: Tailwind provides spacing utilities such as 'm-' for margin and 'p-' for padding.
lessons.task: Add margin between the buttons and padding inside them.
lessons.previewBaseCSS: body { font-family: system-ui, sans-serif; padding: 1.25rem; } .btn { background-color: #3498db; color: white; border-radius: 0.375rem; }

validations.message: Add 'm-2' to add spacing between the buttons

lessons.title: Using Hover Variants
lessons.description: Tailwind makes it easy to add hover styles using the 'hover:' prefix.
lessons.task: Add a hover effect that changes the background color of the button to green.
lessons.previewBaseCSS: body { font-family: system-ui, sans-serif; padding: 1.25rem; } .action { padding: 0.75rem 1.25rem; border-radius: 0.5rem; background-color: #ccc; color: #000; }

validations.message: Add 'hover:bg-green-500' to change background color on hover

lessons.title: Combining Multiple Classes
lessons.description: You can combine multiple Tailwind utilities to quickly build components.
lessons.task: Style the card with a white background, shadow, rounded corners, padding, and center-aligned text.
lessons.previewBaseCSS: body { font-family: system-ui, sans-serif; padding: 1.25rem; background-color: #f3f4f6; }
